vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Girgas(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.16; descended from Canaan (H3667); along with Sidon (H6721), Heth (H2845), Jebusite (H2983), Amorite (H0567), Hivite (H2340), Arkite (H6208), Sinite (H5513), Arvadite (H0721), Zemarite (H6786) and Hamathite (H2577); also called in KJV: Girgasite;
§ Girgashite or Girgasite = "dwelling on a clayey soil"
descendants of Canaan and one of the nations living east of the sea of Galilee when the Israelites entered the promised land
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
革迦撒人
1)迦南的後裔, 當時以色列人進應許地, 是加利利海東方國家之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
革迦撒人
1)迦南的后裔, 当时以色列人进应许地, 是加利利海东方国家之一
